name: Page
description: You recruit a page who heralds your approach and has the ability to smooth the path of your diplomatic missions.
prerequisites: Character level 4th, proficiency with martial weapons
benefit: This feat is similar to the Leadership feat, with several exceptions. You can attract only a 1st-level cohort (referred to hereafter as a page) with this feat, and canâ€™t recruit followers. You determine your Leadership score according to the rules presented in the Leadership feat, but your page is always at least 3 levels lower than your level.
